original_title: Mariposas Azules Del Cerro Del Topo Chico
overview: Janet Guardiola, together with her two daughters Sophia and Samantha, form the group of naturalists Mariposas Azules, which originated due to the need for environmental protection for the Cerro del Topo Chico in Escobedo, Nuevo León, Mexico. Seeing that her work observing nature is giving good results, Janet fosters her model at the Ojo de agua Jardines del Canada, with little Jazmín.
title: Mariposas Azules Del Cerro Del Topo Chico
